extendedInfo.description: Welcome to dragon hunter HD2, new boss, more powerful magicWant to be a dragon hunter? Challenge this tower defense game from Feelingtouch Inc.Attack dragons to guard your castle.How to play:* shoot arrows by moving your fingers on the screen.* earn coins when kill dragons.* collect food use your boat after dragon dead.* use coins to upgrade your arrow, magic power and other property.* repair your castle with your repairman* use your mages to kill them all.Provides:* Weapons like arrow,poison arrow and dizzy arrow. increase your arrow power and arrow numbers.* Repairman that repair your wounded castle. use coins to recruit more repairman to speed up.* Food, Coins and Hunters. hunters will consume food every stage and game over if food not enough.* Magic like Fire mage, Ice mage, Wind mage and light mage, increase your magic power.* Boss with 3 different weapon and magic.* addctive as temple runemail us if any problem or suggestion.thanks***PLEASE READ***In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen.Search shortcut on your bookmarks.This will help me bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.***If you like defender you will like this game!

reviews.title: Graphics  like Psp Patapon
reviews.comment: Graphics like patapon but  unique user interface and game principle.  Cool!
reviews.author: Jerome Fortaleza

reviews.title: Doesn\'t fit the screen
reviews.comment: I have the HTC DNA and the game doesn\'t quite fit the screen. I have had this game on other devices and love it. Would change to 5 stars if fixed
reviews.author: Skyler Russell

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Best game ,easy to play good up grades. Over all a lil short but good, my daughters love it .great game for the kids
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Let\'s see how much you guys like this game
reviews.comment: After you get to level 80. Stop making the bosses cheat! The level lags and the boss throws a billion beams that reflect your arrows. Oh did I mention that they go directly in front of your crossbows, letting all the dragons build up and and completely destroy you every single time? -_-
reviews.author: Nathanielsaurus Alvarado

reviews.title: Fun and simple with good upgrade
reviews.comment: Fun and simple with good upgrade
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its awsome but its TO EASY so if u want a challange go and get another game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dude this game is awesome! !!!!!! Those who don\'t have this game...SHAME ON U!!!!!!
reviews.author: Dhanya Mehavannan

reviews.title: Fun and enjoyable
reviews.comment: Its bit overly complicated, out filled with crazy unnecessary upgrades. Very fun. Definitely worth downloading.
reviews.author: Shane Blackburn

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: This is a fun game to pass the time with. Upgrades are a nice touch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Fun to play ,really passes the time. Recommended for everyone!
reviews.author: Kian Munoz

reviews.title: Pretty cool but.....
reviews.comment: It takes too long to get coins and everything costs so much. Aw well great game though
reviews.author: Phyllis RedHorn

reviews.title: Okay....but
reviews.comment: I love this game, but i wish it let you keep the coins you got even if you failed a level otherwise you are stuck on that level when you cant upgrade anything
reviews.author: Lexi Hill

reviews.title: Coins
reviews.comment: When upgrading the prices will go higher and higher.. and it\'s likely, very impossible to reach.. and killing dragins in training has a very low gold drop.. and the player will be force to buy a very expensive game coins.. was that a kind of business or something kind of cheat?  My answer is both (personal interest) I\'m educated about business, man.. so I do know what are the needs and wants of every business.. this game never deserve five stars.. UNINSTALLING
reviews.author: Arnold Pintor

reviews.title: I still love this game!
reviews.comment: I git this a long time ago, now, but I still love playing it. Can\'t beat the classic feel. Easy to pick up and play.
reviews.author: Gwendolyn Anderson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Get it it\'s great!! :-)
reviews.author: Paulina Rodriguez

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice.. Good game, takes away alot of time,
reviews.author: june robert capichino

reviews.title: Awesome but HD looks the same.
reviews.comment: I got the HD for my tablet, yet it looks the same as the normal on my tablet. I have the Nexus 7 so I don\'t know of the resolution is too high. but awesome game though. Gotta really think what to do during waves of dragons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the best dragon hunting game I have ever played..no lacks..I can\'t stop playing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWSOME
reviews.comment: This game is awsome!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fun and addicting! Powerup purchase screen needs descriptions, though
reviews.author: Gabriella Chisari
